note.p: Army officer and politician. Son of Panton Corbett of Longnor Hall, Shropshire. Ensign, Fifty-first Light Infantry, 1837; lieutenant, 1839; retired in 1844. Lieutenant-colonel of the Shropshire Militia from 1855. Conservative MP for South Shropshire, 1868–77.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 May 2015)
